medical_history.chief_complaint: Middle and upper abdominal pain and discomfort for more than 1 month, combined with systemic skin yellowing and itching for 2 weeks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started over 1 month ago without obvious inducement, initially being intolerable. Two weeks before admission, abdominal pain aggravated, and yellow sclera, yellowish skin, and skin itching developed.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of diabetes for 1 year, treated with metformin and acarbose.
